alert.note: Alert for Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Locally heavy rainfall will impact portions of Gilchrist, Suwannee, Hamilton and Echols Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 450 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking heavy rainfall over the Suwannee River Valley. Movement was northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, Trenton, Jennings, White Springs, Bell, Statenville, Suwannee River State Park, Suwannee Springs and Mayday. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
